title: type
description: The aggregation of properties, their value-types and their rendering rules.

id.description: The unique identifier of the type.

description.description: The human-readable description of what the type represents.

schema.description: The json-schema used to validate the type.

rendering.description: The rendering code for all the supported formats.

format.description: The identifier for the file format

template.description: The template to be used for the specified format

examples.description: Arcane or mystical arts that can be used inside or outside combat.

recovery.description: How many turns must be passed before using the spell again.

effect.description: The effect that is executed when the spell is used.

icon.description: The icon that represents the spell.
